item.title: Re: Trading
item.content:encoded:
Step 1: Both characters use an Avian Attraction Spray
Step 2: One character gives the other permission to look into their Bucket
Step 3: The character that GOT permission looks into the other character's bucket and makes a trade offer
Step 4: The other character accepts or denies the trade.

EXAMPLE:
Pinky wants to trade with Emosuke. They both use a Spray, providing them access to the Trade Menu until next Dayroll. From the Trade Menu, Emosuke types Pinky's name into a text field, giving Pinky permission to look into his Bucket. Next, in her Trade Menu, Pinky types Emosuke's name into a different text field, and now she is shown the contents of Emosuke's bucket. At that point, she can select what she wants, and can select items in her own Bucket in exchange. She confirms, and the details of the offer is sent to Emosuke. If he wants to, he can accept the trade, and the selected items are immediately exchanged. Afterwards, Pinky can no longer look into Emosuke's Bucket, unless he gives her permission again.
